018
019package org.jgrapes.mail.events;
020
021import jakarta.mail.Address;
022import jakarta.mail.BodyPart;
023import jakarta.mail.MessagingException;
024import jakarta.mail.internet.MimeMultipart;
025
026import java.util.Collections;
027import java.util.HashMap;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
031import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
032
033/**
034 * Indicates the arrival of a new message. Handler should delete
035 * the message after successful processing.
036 */
037public class SendMailMessage extends Event<Void> {
038
039    private Address from;
040    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortVariable", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
041    private List<Address> to;
042    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
043    private List<Address> cc = Collections.emptyList();
044    private List<Address> bcc = Collections.emptyList();
045    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
046    private final Map<String, String> headers = new HashMap<>();
047    private String subject;
048    private MimeMultipart body;
049
050    /**
051     * Creates a new event.
052     *
053     * @param channels the channels
054     */
055    public SendMailMessage(Channel... channels) {
056        super(channels);
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * Gets the from addresses.
061     *
062     * @return the from
063     */
064    public Address from() {
065        return from;
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Sets the from.
070     *
071     * @param from the from to set
072     */
073    public SendMailMessage setFrom(Address from) {
074        this.from = from;
075        return this;
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Gets the to addresses.
080     *
081     * @return the to
082     */
083    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortMethodName")
084    public List<Address> to() {
085        return to;
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * Sets the to addresses.
090     *
091     * @param to the to addresses to set
092     */
093    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
094    public SendMailMessage setTo(List<Address> to) {
095        this.to = to;
096        return this;
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Gets the cc addresses.
101     *
102     * @return the cc
103     */
104    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortMethodName")
105    public List<Address> cc() {
106        return cc;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Sets the cc addresses.
111     *
112     * @param cc the cc adresses to set
113     */
114    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
115    public SendMailMessage setCc(List<Address> cc) {
116        this.cc = cc;
117        return this;
118    }
119
120    /**
121     * Gets the bcc addresses.
122     *
123     * @return the bcc
124     */
125    public List<Address> bcc() {
126        return bcc;
127    }
128
129    /**
130     * Sets the bcc addresses.
131     *
132     * @param bcc the bcc addresses to set
133     */
134    public SendMailMessage setBcc(List<Address> bcc) {
135        this.bcc = bcc;
136        return this;
137    }
138
139    /**
140     * Return the headers.
141     *
142     * @return the headers
143     */
144    public Map<String, String> headers() {
145        return headers;
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Sets a header.
150     *
151     * @param name the name
152     * @param value the value
153     * @return the send mail message
154     */
155    public SendMailMessage setHeader(String name, String value) {
156        headers.put(name, value);
157        return this;
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Gets the subject.
162     *
163     * @return the subject
164     */
165    public String subject() {
166        return subject;
167    }
168
169    /**
170     * Sets the subject.
171     *
172     * @param subject the subject to set
173     */
174    public SendMailMessage setSubject(String subject) {
175        this.subject = subject;
176        return this;
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * Gets the body.
181     *
182     * @return the body
183     */
184    public MimeMultipart body() {
185        return body;
186    }
187
188    /**
189     * Sets the body.
190     *
191     * @param body the body to set
192     */
193    public SendMailMessage setBody(MimeMultipart body) {
194        this.body = body;
195        return this;
196    }
197
198    /**
199     * Adds the part to the body.
200     *
201     * @param part the part
202     * @return the send mail message
203     * @throws MessagingException the messaging exception
204     */
205    public SendMailMessage addBodyPart(BodyPart part)
206            throws MessagingException {
207        if (body == null) {
208            body = new MimeMultipart();
209        }
210        body.addBodyPart(part);
211        return this;
212    }
213}
